org.waarp.openr66.dao

Interface TransferDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractDAO<Transfer>, Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBTransferDAO, H2TransferDAO, MariaDBTransferDAO, MySqlDBTransferDAO, OracleTransferDAO, PostgreSQLTransferDAO, XMLTransferDAO

    public interface TransferDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Transfer>
    Interface to interact with Transfer objects in the persistance layer

    • Method Summary

         throws DAOConnectionException,

        Retrieve the Transfer object with the specified Special ID from the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        id - special ID of the Transfer object requested
        Throws:
        DAOConnectionException - If a data access error occurs
        DAONoDataException - if no data are available

      • exist

        boolean exist(long id,
              String requester,
              String requested,
              String owner)
       throws DAOConnectionException
        Verify if a Transfer object with the specified Special ID exists in the persistance layer
        Parameters:
        id - special ID of the Transfer object verified
        Returns:
        true if a Transfer object with the specified Special ID exist; false if no Transfer object correspond to the specified Special ID.
        Throws:
        DAOConnectionException - If a data access error occurs
